definitions.definition: Any of a group of protozoan parasites which are transmitted by biting insects and infect the blood of humans and other vertebrates ; order Trypanosomatida in class Kinetoplastea

subdefinitions.definition: Trypanosoma , a genus within Trypanosomatida whose members are often referred to as trypanosomes Trypanosoma brucei , a major human pathogen that causes sleeping sickness . Trypanosoma cruzi , a major human pathogen that causes Chagas disease .
Trypomastigotes , a morphological class of trypanosomatids with a flagellum laterally attached to the cell body.

main_definition: Any of a group of protozoan parasites which are transmitted by biting insects and infect the blood of humans and other vertebrates ; order Trypanosomatida in class Kinetoplastea
